Text: DominicanPST Hi Jon I just got an answer from the resortthey are quoting a rate of US per night That would be your cost to share the room and have the same all inclusive features You would pay this amount locally I am still waiting to hear from the tour company that I booked the other guys through I will keep you posted Thanks Debby

DominicanPST Hi Jon Sorry to take so long getting back to you I have asked the tour company what the cost would be to have you in the room with the others plus I have emailed the hotel to see what they would charge if you just paid it locally So far I have heard from neither The tour company did say it could take a few days to find out whether or not they could do it Because the most likely way for you to get there will be with American Airlines I checked with their tour desk and they did offer the same hotel but didnt have any space left All I can tell you at this point is that your airfare with American Airlines will be around US In the meantime you might try calling a travel agency down there to see what the best rate is they can find on a flight for you from Feb They might have differnet fares that arent available from here I will keep you posted on the hotel pswhich one of the guys do you know Talk to you soon Debby
